nodes.html: After all nodes read the transaction and confirm that the user has sufficient funds, they approve the transaction to proceed. Because every node takes part in verifying transactions, a transaction can only be canceled or denied if 51% of the nodes agree that itâs invalid.

nodes.html: After a node validates new transactions, they are bundled into blocks and added to the blockchain according to the networkâs established rules. Once added, no node can alter the contents of any block, ensuring that the recorded data remains permanent and unchangeable.

issues.title: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color
issues.description: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 1.47:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #0000ff, surrounding text: #333333)
The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text

issues.title: Links rely on color to be distinguishable.
issues.description: Low-contrast text is difficult or impossible for many users to read. Link text that is discernible improves the experience for users with low vision. [Learn how to make links distinguishable](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/link-in-text-block).
